WorkItem.Description:
This item shows up with colored squares in place of the gems (you can not put in gems), and when optimizing with it in a leg slot, the optimizer complains that this combination isn't available. Seems broken.

Item 47785
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Kel'Thauzad's Leggings of Conquest seems broken

Comments.Message: Sounds like you've got an ungemmed copy of them marked specifically available (blue diamond). That would create the situation you describe, and is not a bug.
There is no blue diamond associated with the Kel'Thauzad's Leggings of Conquest.  Indeed, even with all filters on, it does not show up in the Comparisons/Legs list to choose...
If it isn't showing up in the comparisons chart, where are you seeing it? Post your character file, and we can see what you did wrong.
Not sure what I was doing wrong, but the problem seems to have gone away.  Working as expected now.  Thanks.
